article.title: Infoscitex Awarded Human Measurement and Signatures Intelligence Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Infoscitex Corporation, Waltham, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $46,900,000 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for research and development for the Human Measurement and Signatures Intelligence Program.Â The Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
